attributes.action: It doesnt make sense to give tax free benefits
attributes.additional_details:
If someone earns £35000 pa their take home pay
is only £26000 and yet someone on a benefit cap
of £26000 is given the money tax free ,which is the
equivalent of a gross salary of £35000.This is not fair
and does not make sense.I therefore call on the government to tax benefits the same as working
people and stop making an exception of them.
